etymology: Slavic origin word. Related to other South Slavic languages
cultural_note: Bulgaria has diverse nature: Black Sea coast, mountains, rose valleys
notes_de_to_bg: Für Deutschsprachige: 'Слънце' ≈ 'Sonne'. Bulgarisches Wort. Häufig verwendet.
notes_bg_to_de: 'Die Sonne' е женски род. Фраза: 'Die Sonne scheint' (слънцето грее).
linguistic_note_de_to_bg: Bulgarian word at word level. Pay attention to stress and pronunciation

etymology: Slavic origin word. Related to other South Slavic languages
cultural_note: Bulgaria has diverse nature: Black Sea coast, mountains, rose valleys
notes_de_to_bg: Für Deutschsprachige: 'Дъжд' ≈ 'Regen'. Bulgarisches Wort. Häufig verwendet.
notes_bg_to_de: 'Der Regen' е мъжки род; често се използва 'Es regnet' (вали).

etymology: Slavic origin word. Related to other South Slavic languages

notes_de_to_bg: Für Deutschsprachige: 'Вятър' ≈ 'Wind'. Bulgarisches Wort. Häufig verwendet.
notes_bg_to_de: 'Der Wind' е мъжки род. Използва се в 'starker Wind' или 'es weht ein Wind'.

etymology: Slavic origin word. Related to other South Slavic languages

notes_bg_to_de: 'Die Temperatur' е женски род. Израз: 'die Temperatur messen' (меря температура).

etymology: Slavic origin word. Related to other South Slavic languages
cultural_note: Bulgaria has diverse nature: Black Sea coast, mountains, rose valleys
notes_de_to_bg: Für Deutschsprachige: 'Облаци' ≈ 'Wolken'. Bulgarisches Wort. Häufig verwendet.
notes_bg_to_de: 'Die Wolken' е множествено число; 'eine Wolke' е единичен облак. Фраза: 'am Himmel sind Wolken'.

notes_bg_to_de: 'Der Wald' е мъжки род. Типично: 'im Wald spazieren gehen'.

etymology: Slavic origin word. Related to other South Slavic languages

notes_de_to_bg: Für Deutschsprachige: 'Река' ≈ 'Fluss'. Bulgarisches Wort. Häufig verwendet.
notes_bg_to_de: 'Der Fluss' е мъжки род; множествено 'die Flüsse'. Израз: 'am Fluss wohnen'.

notes_de_to_bg: Für Deutschsprachige: 'Планина' ≈ 'Berg'. Bulgarisches Wort. Häufig verwendet.

notes: 'Море' bedeutet Meer und ist mit dem russischen 'more' verwandt; es geht auf eine urslawische Wurzel zurück.
etymology: Slavic origin word. Related to other South Slavic languages
cultural_note: Bulgaria has diverse nature: Black Sea coast, mountains, rose valleys
notes_de_to_bg: Für Deutschsprachige: 'Море' ≈ 'Meer'. Bulgarisches Wort. Häufig verwendet.
notes_bg_to_de: 'Das Meer' е неутрално. Израз: 'ans Meer fahren' (отивам на море).
linguistic_note_de_to_bg: Bulgarian word at word level. Pay attention to stress and pronunciation

notes_bg_to_de: 'Слънце' е среден род. Sun

cultural_note: Nature vocabulary essential for describing Bulgarian landscape. Sun

notes: Sea. 'Черно море' (Black Sea) borders Bulgaria. среден род.
